closeViewWhenFileDeleted.description: Set to true to automatically close the PDF tab when the disk file is deleted

fileExtensions.title: PDF file extensions
fileExtensions.description: Files with these extensions will be opened as PDFs

enableSynctex.title: Enable SyncTeX
enableSynctex.description: Allows double clicking a generated TeX PDF to open the corresponding source file location

description: Atom PDF viewer based on PDF.js inc. parameters
name: pdf-viewer

pdfview.description: Subscribe to PDF actions such as opening files and clicks
